_meta.purpose: New kin (Half-Elf) from the Drakborgen adventure module. Designed as a separate data package that can be enabled or disabled independently.
_meta.language_note: Swedish original terms preserved in 'name_sv' and 'description_sv' fields. This is a third-party adventure module with no official English translation; all English translations are unofficial and flagged with 'translation_official: false'.
_meta.compatibility: Adds one new kin. The kin is not part of any kin roll table — it must be chosen freely by the player with GM approval.

mechanical_effects.value: The first WP spent on any activation automatically counts as 2 WP. Involuntary — does not count toward the cost. Effective power level of the ability is increased by 1.

mechanical_effects.note: Choose Spot Hidden OR Awareness per activation, not both
